allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "Implement delta-based undo/redo system" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Adds a comprehensive undo/redo system using change records \(deltas\) instead of full state snapshots
- Each change type \(add, delete, transform, update text/prompt/model\) has its own ChangeRecord implementation with reversible apply/reverse methods
- History persists to S3 as a sidecar file \(history.json\) alongside each scene
- Includes both toolbar buttons \(Undo/Redo\) and keyboard shortcuts \(Ctrl+Z, Ctrl+Y\)

## Test plan
- [ ] Create text, image, and prompt items - verify each action can be undone/redone
- [ ] Transform items \(move, resize, rotate\) - verify transforms can be undone/redone
- [ ] Edit text/prompt content - verify edits can be undone/redone
- [ ] Delete items - verify deletions can be undone/redone
- [ ] Verify Ctrl+Z and Ctrl+Y keyboard shortcuts work
- [ ] Verify Undo/Redo buttons enable/disable appropriately
- [ ] Reload page and verify history is restored from S3

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)
EOF
\)")
